caseTitle: Asrar Ahmed v. Chairman, Pakistan Aeronautical Complex Board, Kamra & others
tagline: Discussion: (1) Section 3 & 7 of Pakistan Aeronautical Complex Board Ordinance, 2000 read with Rule 2 & 4 of PAC Board Employees (Service) Rules, 2002. (2) Option under Factory Routine Order No.16 for the new service rules or to be governed by old rules cannot be construed as violation of any fundamental rights but it was founded on consensual act of every individual employee.
